# @structium/env

Serialize and deserialize .env files

::: code-group

```bash [npm]
npm install @structium/env
```

```bash [pnpm]
pnpm install @structium/env
```

```bash [yarn]
yarn add @structium/env
```

```bash [bun]
bun add @structium/env
```

```bash [deno]
deno add @structium/env
```

:::

## ➕ More

- 📖 [API Docs](api.md)
- 📦 [NPM](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@structium/env)
